page_content:
VALUING OUR PEOPLEALLOGENE ENVIRONMENTAL, SOCIAL AND GOVERNANCE REPORT    |  8
We are creating a scientific revolution  . We only succeed as a team  . 
We accomplish more together than as individuals when we unite as one Allogene community  .
 We are resilient, because we strive to save the lives of people with cancer  . 
We come together with purpose, courage and flexibility despite challenges or uncertainty because 
every potential patient is someone’s partner, parent, child, sibling or friend  .
 We aim for excellence and give it our all  .
We pursue scientific innovation with a focus on quality and integrity in everything we do to forever 
change how cancer is treated  . 
 We take ownership and get things done  .
We are leaders who embrace urgency, initiative and follow through, with the humility to know each 
one of us is vital to making AlloCAR T therapy a reality  .
 We are good to one another  .
We value diversity of thought, background and expertise, we earn each other’s trust, and assume 
good intention as we collaborate to help patients  .
We are One AllogeneWe are One Allogene
